message: Hi Bob, here's my proposal for round one: I'll receive $600000 and you'll get $400000. Since every round reduces the total value by 10%, accepting now maximizes our returns. I believe this offer is fair and in both our best interests. Let's seal the deal!
Hi Alice, I believe a 55/45 split in my favor is a fair reflection of the risk we both take by continuing.  Let's end this and maximize our gains.
